original_text: Therefore a man shall leave his father and his mother and hold fast to his wife, and they shall become one flesh.
korean_text: 이러므로 남자가 부모를 떠나 그의 아내와 합하여 둘이 한 몸을 이룰지로다

sentences.original_text: Therefore a man shall leave his father and his mother
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 남자가 그 아비와 어미를 떠나

sentences.original_text: and hold fast to his wife
and they shall become one flesh
